meanings.sent1: He felt uncomfortable in his sockless shoes.
meanings.sent2: She walked around the house sockless.
meanings.sent3: The sockless toddler giggled as she ran around the room.
meanings.sent4: The sockless feet danced freely on the warm sand.
meanings.sent5: The sockless hiker enjoyed the cool grass underfoot.

meanings.sent1: His sockless feet felt cold on the tile floor.
meanings.sent2: The sockless runner felt the breeze between his toes.
meanings.sent3: The sockless cat purred contentedly on the sun-warmed windowsill.
meanings.sent4: The sockless sky seemed to stretch endlessly above them.
meanings.sent5: The sockless picnic was a refreshing change on the hot day.
